title: PROJECT:Poro Icon Bug
body: I've noticed a bug with the Project Poro Icon, it seems to make it completely black in ranked premades, Summoner Icon select, friends list etc. The only place where it's not black is where you hover over a name on the friends list, where it just turns pink. This probably isn't a huge priority for Rito but seeing how it's probably pretty simple to fix and concerns a paid-for product i decided to make a post about it. Cheers.
